short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Video from Threads network. Download feature to save any Video from Threads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Threadow you can download any video from Threads ❤️‍🔥 network in one click, and save it to your PC or laptop. This browser extension provides unique feature 🔥 which is not supported by official website of the network. 

After adding the Threads video downloader 🔝 to your browser you will see Download button on each video, by clicking it you will save this video to your hard drive to use or keep it for later.

Threadow supports all file formats 😲 used in Threads and saves videos in best resolution available. 🤩

🫶🏻Save any video to your hard drive and use it later to watch, share, upload, repost, etc. 🫶🏻
